meta.title: About Us - AnyTrans
meta.description: Learn about AnyTrans - our mission, values, team, and journey in making translation accessible to everyone.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: From a small team with a big vision to a global platform trusted by thousands

values.title: Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in our growth story

social.title: Connect With Us
social.subtitle: Follow us on social media for updates and tips

hero.description: We're on a mission to make professional translation accessible to everyone, empowering global communication through innovative AI technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize professional translation services by leveraging cutting-edge AI technology, making it fast, accurate, and accessible to businesses and individuals worldwide. We believe that language should never be a barrier to opportunity, knowledge, or connection.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To create a world where language differences don't limit human potential. We envision a future where everyone can communicate seamlessly across borders, cultures, and languages, fostering global collaboration and understanding through innovative translation technology.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: We deliver accurate translations that preserve meaning and context across languages.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Lightning-fast translation without compromising quality, powered by advanced AI.

security.title: Security
security.description: Your documents are protected with enterprise-grade encryption and privacy.

userCentric.title: User-Centric
userCentric.description: Built with simplicity and user experience at the heart of every feature.

2021.title: Company Founded
2021.description: AnyTrans was born from a vision to make translation accessible to everyone.

2022.title: 10K+ Users
2022.description: Reached our first major milestone with users from 50+ countries.

2023.title: AI Integration
2023.description: Launched advanced AI-powered translation engine with 98% accuracy.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.description: Expanded to support 100+ languages and opened offices in 3 continents.

cta.title: Ready to Break Language Barriers?
cta.description: Join thousands of users who trust AnyTrans for their translation needs. Start translating documents today.
